name: Spacial Force
description:
The Special Force, is a group of highly-trained elite soldiers chosen for operations and impossible missions

You are one of the soldiers of this group, and your goal is to eliminate the terrorists who are trying to carry out their terrorist actions against civilians.
You will face many terrorists in many places, but you have sufficient courage and many weapons that will help you complete your missions and eliminate these groups.

Games Features:
   - FPS android shooter game
   - Languages: Arabic / English

Download the game for free from google play store
